#labels model,api,class
Fetches the record with the passed `id`, saves it with the passed `attributes` or named arguments (if the validation permits it), and returns it.
If the save fails because of validation errors, the unsaved object is still returned.
Attribute names and values can be passed in either using named arguments or as a struct to the `attributes` argument.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| id || yes || numeric || || primary key value of row to update ||
|| attributes || yes, if no named arguments are present || struct || || attribute name/value pairs ||
|| instantiate || no || boolean || true || `true` will instantiate the object and call its `update` method, `false` will update using a query ||
|| named argument(s) || yes, if no `attributes` argument is present || || || attribute value (the argument name should match the name of the attribute) ||

See the section on UpdatingExistingRows for more information and code examples.
